Html Attribute Encode.description: Encodes the specified string so that it can be used in an HTML attribute.

Html Decode.description: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded into a decoded string.

Html Encode.description: Converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

Xml Attribute Encode.description: Encodes the specified string so that it can be used in an XML attribute.

Xml Encode.description: Converts a string to an XML-encoded string.
